/opt/intel/composerxe/linux/mpi/intel64/bin/mpiicpc   -std=c++1y -O3 -pedantic -Wall -DENABLE_PERF_MEASUREMENT -qopenmp -xhost -vec-report=5   CMakeFiles/smoothlife_local.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/smoothlife_local.dir/simulator.cpp.o CMakeFiles/smoothlife_local.dir/sdl_gui.cpp.o CMakeFiles/smoothlife_local.dir/ogl_gui.cpp.o CMakeFiles/smoothlife_local.dir/ogl_shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/smoothlife_local.dir/ogl_texture.cpp.o  -o smoothlife_local -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lSDL2main -Wl,-Bdynamic -lSDL2 -lGL -lGLU -lGLEW
